organisation_name: Transeo AISBL, European Association for SME Transfer (Transeo AISBL)
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
commission_expert_groups_and_other_simil: Commission Expert Group on Transfers of Business#E02840#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=2840#Observer#C
goals__remit: Transeo encourages and promotes the exchange of good practices between experts to stimulate the European SME transfer market. Transeo increases awareness of the business transfer issue at regional, national and European level and works on solutions and projects to improve business transfer at European scale.
